title: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly is left red faced as he flashes junk on the show
text:
The Bachelorette often finds herself in awkward moments.

But on Thursday night, it was suitor Timm Hanly, 27, who was left red-faced when he accidentally flashed Angie Kent, 29.

During the episode, the Victorian fire-proofer was dressed as a lobster alongside on a group date with BMX rider Matt and Bachelorette Angie.

'I can see your bits': The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly (M) was left red-faced as he flashes his 'lobster balls' during an accidental X-rated moment on the show on Thursday night

While Matt, who was dressed as King Neptune, got cosy with Angie during the shoot, it was then that Timm started to act sassy by squatting.

'I can see your bits,' Angie said, to a clearly embarrassed Timm.

Quickly standing up, Timm replied: 'hey, eyes are up here.'

Oh no! 'I can see your bits,' Angie said, to a clearly embarrassed Timm. Quickly standing up, Timm replied: 'hey, eyes are up here'

As Matt and Angie both started laughing, she continued: 'I just fully. I fully saw your junk.'

Timm shrugged off the X-rated incident, which saw Angie burst into a fit of laughter at the embarrassing moment.

'Just saw his little... his little lobster balls. I didn't expect to see that much of Timm this soon.'

Just minutes earlier, Angie and hunk Matt were looking very close during the racy photoshoot

Showing she was able to take it in good humour, Angie laughed the entire incident off.

'It made me laugh, and my biggest thing is havin' a laugh,' she said.

'So I was...didn't mind. Didn't mind the eyeful,' she added.

The Bachelorette continues on Wednesday, Channel Ten, 7.30pm.
description: The Bachelorette often finds herself in awkward moments.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
